mapper.sql: SELECT t1.APPUITHEME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISENABLE, t1.LANGUAGE, t1.LASTCHGPWDTIME, t1.LASTLOGINTIME, t1.LOGINACCOUNTID, t1.LOGINACCOUNTNAME, t1.ORGADMIN, t1.PWD, t1.SUPERUSER, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4, t1.USERID, t11.USERNAME FROM T_SRFLOGINACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSER t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USERID

SELECT t1.`APPUITHEME`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ISENABLE`, t1.`LANGUAGE`, t1.`LASTCHGPWDTIME`, t1.`LASTLOGINTIME`, t1.`LOGINACCOUNTID`, t1.`LOGINACCOUNTNAME`, t1.`ORGADMIN`, t1.`PWD`, t1.`SUPERUSER`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USERDATA3`, t1.`USERDATA4`, t1.`USERID`, t11.`USERNAME` FROM `T_SRFLOGINACCOUNT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSER t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USERID

SELECT t1.APPUITHEME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISENABLE, t1.LANGUAGE, t1.LASTCHGPWDTIME, t1.LASTLOGINTIME, t1.LOGINACCOUNTID, t1.LOGINACCOUNTNAME, t1.ORGADMIN, t1.PWD, t1.SUPERUSER, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4, t1.USERID, t11.USERNAME FROM T_LOGINACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_USER t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USERID

SELECT t1.APPUITHEME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISENABLE, t1.LANGUAGE, t1.LASTCHGPWDTIME, t1.LASTLOGINTIME, t1.LOGINACCOUNTID, t1.LOGINACCOUNTNAME, t1.ORGADMIN, t1.PWD, t1.SUPERUSER, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4, t1.USERID, t11.USERNAME FROM T_SRFLOGINACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSER t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USERID

SELECT t1.APPUITHEME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISENABLE, t1.LANGUAGE, t1.LASTCHGPWDTIME, t1.LASTLOGINTIME, t1.LOGINACCOUNTID, t1.LOGINACCOUNTNAME, t1.ORGADMIN, t1.PWD, t1.SUPERUSER, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4, t1.USERID, t11.USERNAME FROM T_SRFLOGINACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSER t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USERID

SELECT t1.[APPUITHEME], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ISENABLE], t1.[LANGUAGE], t1.[LASTCHGPWDTIME], t1.[LASTLOGINTIME], t1.[LOGINACCOUNTID], t1.[LOGINACCOUNTNAME], t1.[ORGADMIN], t1.[PWD], t1.[SUPERUSER], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDATA], t1.[USERDATA2], t1.[USERDATA3], t1.[USERDATA4], t1.[USERID], t11.[USERNAME] FROM [T_SRFLOGINACCOUNT] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSER t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USERID
